titleStmt.title: The reclaimed papist· Or The process of a papist knight reformd by a Protestant lady wth [sic] the assistance of a Presbyterian minister and his wife an Independent. And the whole conference, wherby that notable reformation was effected.
titleStmt.author: J. V. C. (John Vincent Canes), d. 1672.

notesStmt.note: "The prolog" signed: J.B.V., F.C., i.e. John Vincent Canes.
In fact, not an anti-Catholic book as the title suggests, but its opposite.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
